import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Col, Form, FormGroup, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Row, } from 'reactstrap'; import Validation from '../../../containers/Validation' export default class AdminCreate extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { input:{ user_name:'', name:'', password:'' }, validation:new Validation({}, []) } } handleSubmit=async ()=>{ const response=await axios.post(process.env.REACT_APP_ADMIN_URL+'/manager/create',this.state,{ headers:{'Authorization':'Bearer '+this.props.token}, }) if(response.data.status=='success') this.props.history.push('/admin/manager') } render() { return (
Add admin
Name (this.inputNode = node)} autoComplete="name" /> Username (this.inputNode = node)} autoComplete="user_name" /> Password (this.inputNode = node)} autoComplete="current-password" />
); } }
